update.foreach: INTO ITEM_ORDER (ORDER_NO, ORDER_TITLE, USER_NO, ADDRESS_NO, MERCHANT_UID, ITEM_NO, ITEM_QUAN, ITEM_PRICE, ITEM_TOTAL_PRICE, ORDER_REGDATE) VALUES( ITEM_ORDER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{item.order_title}, #{item.user_no}, #{item.address_no}, #{item.merchant_uid}, #{item.item_no}, #{item.item_quan}, #{item.item_price}, #{item.item_total_price}, SYSDATE )

mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT ORDER_NO, ORDER_TITLE, USER_NO, ADDRESS_NO, MERCHANT_UID, ITEM_NO, ITEM_QUAN, ITEM_PRICE, ITEM_TOTAL_PRICE, ORDER_REGDATE FROM ITEM_ORDER WHERE USER_NO = #{user_no} ORDER BY ORDER_NO DESC
